name: Colony Odyssey Agency
description:
Current iteration is a single player base building tycoon game where you accept contracts and build bases to further colonize the solar system. current goal is to reach Jupiter and create a mining colony in orbit around the planet.

Future iterations will allow multiplayer in a planetarium and Players will run their own space industry. a space race to see who can reach the furthest reaches of the solar system. Players will be able to trade materials and make contracts for other players; The Players will be able to view and manage their bases from mobile.  Gameplay conclusion parameters are to be decided and are under discussion.
